message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get 60 and you get 40. What do you say?
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation hits you harder.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Take 45 while it's still worth something! My offer in the next round will be much worse for you.
You're right, time is money. And my time is worth more than yours, it seems.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. We'll both lose with this inflation.  A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome now.
